title: Wide Legged Forward Bend C
description: Forward bends, Hip openers, Inversions, Standing Primary body parts engaged Hamstrings, Lower Back, Shoulders, Spine Calves, Glutes & Hip Flexors, Middle Back / Lats, Upper Back & Lower Traps Strengthens legs and spine, stretches shoulders How to perform Wide Legged Forward Bend C Stand with your feet 3 to 5 feet apart and parallel. Interlace your fingers behind you. Lift your chest and lengthen your spine with an inhale. Bend forward with an exhale, keeping your spine long. Lift your arms up and overhead.
pose_description: Wide Legged Forward Bend C - PrasaritaPadottanasanaC
alignment_cues: Maintain steady breath throughout the pose
Keep proper alignment based on pose type
Listen to your body and modify as needed
